ProductInfo.Features:
2.20 GHz 2nd generation Intel Core i3-2330M Processor
4GB DDR3 SDRAM (1 DIMM), Maximum supported = 8GB.  640GB 5400RPM Hard Drive
14.0-inch diagonal HD BrightView LED-backlit Display (1366 x 768).  Intel HD Graphics 3000, video memory support up to 1696MB
SuperMulti DVD burner, Digital Media Card Reader for Secure Digital and Multimedia cards, 3 Universal Serial Bus (USB) 2.0, 1 HDMI, 1 Headphone-out, 1 Microphone-in
802.11b/g/n WLAN and Bluetooth, HP TrueVision HD Webcam with integrated digital microphone, 6-cell 55WHr lithium-ion battery
